column4: Tent Glacier 10 -12 Men Complete ( Textile Decking ) as per DefenceProvisional Specification No.DMSRDE/T&GS/93/408 ( b ), issued by TheDirector, Defence Material and Stores Research &DevelopmentEstablishment DMSRDE P.O G.T. Road, Kanpur : 208013

The Tentage should include a two layer material consisting of Outer Layer ofWaterproof and durable against regular wear & tear and sunlight fadingcapacity. The Inner Layer to be of lighter color shade, durable againstregular wear & tear and dry clean / washable.

The Tentage poles and the superstructure, vertical and/or slant crossmembers need to be made as per Defence Provisional SpecificationNo.DMSRDE/T&GS/93/408 ( b ) and should be painted against rust/corrosionalong with high tensile/bending moment durability.
